question: Which companies in the retail sector have made significant investments in data science technology and also increased their presence on LinkedIn in terms of posts and articles?

subtasks.task: Identify companies in the retail sector that have invested in data science technology. [CompanyInfo, CompanyTechStack]
Determine which of these companies have increased their LinkedIn activity in terms of posts and articles. [PersonaLinkedinActivity]
Filter the results to only include companies from the retail sector. [CompanyInfo]
Cross-reference the companies from the retail sector with their investments and LinkedIn activity. [CompanyTechStack, PersonaLinkedinActivity]
